name: Project Agriculture - Metro-style
description:
Note: Spacebar to fullscreen, ESC to exit fullscreen

How To Play:
Mouse control game - move by mouse-drag. Control the cursor as the carrier for
transportation. The carrier follows where the cursor is pointing at.

Blue: Water
Green: Farm/Food (turn water to food)
Red: People to feed
Orange: Your carrier's capacity. (Total of per unit of water/food)

Bring the cursor over any circle colour stations to interact.

Goal:
To collect water, produce food and feed the people as long as possible!

Thanks for playing my very first Ludum Dare game! Excuse the absent of sound :)

This game is inspired by Mini Metro~
